article_title: On the issues: Virginia's candidates for Senate
article_text:
Harrisonburg, VA (22807)

Today

Partly cloudy.

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , va senate elections, virginia senator, mark warner, ed gillespie, robert sarvis, va election 2014, election 2014, senate candidates, senate candidates va
article_metadata.author: Reporting by Alyssa Miller | contributing writer

og.description: We spoke to senatorial candidates Mark Warner, Ed Gillespie and Robert Sarvis to find out their stance on the big issues.
